Sunday, 24 December, 2023

Ryazani news

The Ryazan delegation congratulated the crew of the submarine with the New Year.

24.12.2023 17:09
The delegation conveyed to the crew gifts and congratulations from the inhabitants Ryazani.

In Ryazani, drivers were given keys to the new shipment of Admiral trolleybuses

24.12.2023 16:30
On 24 December, a party of new Admiral trolleybuses took place in Ryazani.

In Ryazani, the effects of the night snow continue to be eliminated.

24.12.2023 15:45
16 brigades, cars, carcasses, trucks, and about 20 benzopils. The company's managers help clean up the trees.

Nearly 30 km of route were repaired by razian railways during the maintenance and construction campaign

24.12.2023 13:05
For example, a major repair was carried out on the 1st main route on Shilovo-Sheluhovo (14.9 km) and on the 2nd main route on the Komodanovka-Rjajsk section (12.6 km).

Mary Ryazani reported the harvested trees.

24.12.2023 12:22
The tree branches have been removed from the contact network at the intersection of Mayakovsky and Freedom.

In Ryazani on 24 December, 107 tree drops were recorded

24.12.2023 12:10
Damage claims continue to be received by telephone 112.

For the first time, a show with robots will appear in the razor circus.

24.12.2023 12:08
On December 23, in the Ryazan circus, a new year's dance-circuit show, "WOW." His main feature is that robots are involved in the presentation.

The officers were reminded of the 24-hour-a-day-a-day-a-day-a-day-a-day-a-day-a-day-a-day-a-day-a-day-a-day-a-day-a-day-a-area child-threatening line

24.12.2023 12:05
The telephone line allows the behaviour and actions of minors and their legal representatives in extreme situations that threaten their lives and health.

Where the trees fell in Ryazani on December 24

24.12.2023 11:46
On Tatarsky Street, a 7-info local resident was blocked.

In the razor yard, a tree fell on cars.

24.12.2023 10:13
According to the razor, the gun lies on three light vehicles. Locked out of the yard.

Ryazans reported missing trees

24.12.2023 09:29
In Ryazani, trees fell in different parts of the city because of the snow. The photos are published on the morning of 24 December by the users of the social media.

Trolleybus routes have been altered and stopped in Ryazani due to the disruption of the network

24.12.2023 08:50
On the street of Jubilee, 8 trees fell on contact wires.

In the Ryazan region, the winners of the Sresnew Academic Academic Award were named

24.12.2023 08:35
The text of the Order has published the website of the newspaper " Ryazan Statements " .

Large flares and cotton were spotted in Ryazani

24.12.2023 08:17
On the evening of 23 December, in Ryazani, there were bright flashes and cotton. The video of the signatures publishes a telegram called " RZN LIFE " .

Ryuzan energy is eliminating the effects of the snow

24.12.2023 08:03
Since 6 a.m. on 24 December, a special operating regime has been introduced at the Rizanengergo branch.

The Lubba Boulevard started a new year's fair.

23.12.2023 23:24
At the fair, local craftsmen offer a lot of gifts to celebrate.

In the middle of Ryazani, the parade of Morozov and Sniguroka

23.12.2023 22:37
The bright parade started a new year's event in town.

In Troice, the movement on the plain bridge through Oku closed.

23.12.2023 19:35
The reason is to raise water in the river.

The collection of signatures in support of the Putin nomination began

23.12.2023 18:53
The collection points are also organized in the major commercial centres of Ryazani and in several municipalities.

In Kanicaw, it's stopped.

23.12.2023 18:06
This is the stoppage of the Third Quarter.

Ryazan ZAY showed photos of young people on 22 and 23 December

23.12.2023 17:14
The images are published both in the official unit of the agency and on the pages of the head of the USG, Elena Golina.

Alexander Sherin joined the Fair Russia for the Truth party.

23.12.2023 16:43
Sherina's party ticket was given by the Chairman of the Sergei Miron Party.

In the Kasimov ZAC, the young people were congratulated by Snegurka

23.12.2023 16:03
In a magical way, the daughter of a female employee was presented to the Kasimians.

Igumen Luca explained why it was useful to take stock of the year.

23.12.2023 15:08
The outcome provides an opportunity for a person to think about what happened to him in a year and to thank God for them.

The Ryazan region is undergoing snow

23.12.2023 14:04
The Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs has published a meteo warning of snow.

In Ryazan province, the results of the national culture project in 2023 were summarized

23.12.2023 12:07
The Gorny Regional Library held a final meeting of the extended panel of the Regional Ministry of Culture.

In Ryazani, the People ' s Front began collecting signatures in support of the Putin nomination

23.12.2023 11.49
The signatures can be filed until 25 January every day from 10 to 17 hours.

A meeting of the Council on the implementation of the long-term care system was held in Ryazani

23.12.2023 11:09
In 2023, razors, including relatives of older persons and persons with disabilities, were given the opportunity to develop a new career in Care Support and to work officially.

In Ryazan oblast, ski coaches will be judged because of the trauma of the pupil.

23.12.2023 10:01
In May of this year, he, contrary to security, provided a minor with a ski trainer without a protective net.

Contract for the design of a flagship school in Ryazani

23.12.2023 09:43
More than 4 billion roubles will be directed to the federal budget facility.
